metadata.title: CVE-2010-5331 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** In the Linux kernel before 2.6.34, a range check issue indrivers/gpu/drm/radeon/atombios.c could cause an off by one (bufferoverflow) problem. NOTE: At least one Linux maintainer believes that thisCVE is incorrectly assigned and should be rejected because the value ishard coded and are not user-controllable where it is used.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
